EmailTemplate.subject: Showcase Your Successes and Win Two TriCON 2013 Registrations
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> TriTech Wants to Showcase Your Agency Photo/Video Contest; Win Two Registrations to TriCON 2013 Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Client}}, TriTech would like to feature photos and videos of our clients to share their successes! Please submit your files in two easy steps by October 31, 2012:
1) Send in your favorite agency photos* and videos* - whether of your teams (in the field or in the office) or toys (trucks, antique collection of emergency vehicles, etc.). 2) Sign and return the release form.
One lucky winner will be drawn on November 1st from all the submissions and receive two TriCON 2013 registrations to next year's annual conference.
SUBMIT YOUR PHOTOS AND VIDEOS HERE: http://offers.tritech.com/TriCON2012_ProtoContestExtended.html
Proud to be your technology provider and share your dedicated work!
*All photos or videos submitted may be used in TriTech marketing material. Contest Details Photos/Videos Contest
Deadline October 31, 2012 What:
Submit your agency photos/videos and download, sign, and return the release form.
Why:
To showcase your agency successes
WIN: All entries will be entered into a drawing to win two free registrations to the 2013 TriCON Annual Users Conference.
